concept.title: Subscription-Id AVP in the NCC Gy interface

section.title: Handling of Subscription-Id AVP
section.p: The Subscription-Id AVP identifies the end user's subscription ID of type Grouped. The Subscription-Id AVP includes a Subscription-Id-Data AVP that holds the identifier and a Subscription-Id-Type AVP that defines the identifier type.
For all interfaces (that is, Gy, Sy, IMS(Ro)), the NCC application reads and processes the Subscription-Id AVPs in the following order:

note.p: Device gets the subscription-id information using Subscription-Id AVP at the Credit-Control-Request- Initial (CCR-I) request level.
